  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3355</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Power of Informal Writing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Energie des formlosen Schreibens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La puissance de l'écriture sans cérémonie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A potência da escrita informal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'potenza di scrittura informale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η δύναμη του άτυπου γραψίματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La potencia de la escritura informal</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The writer of this article which appears in the ETNI magazine RAG, feels that in order to motivate writing it should be allowed to flow and not be graded. He encourages writing assignments to blogs, forums and possibly Wikis.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">writing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">blogs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Wikis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">foreign language</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Verfasser dieses Artikels, der im ETNI 
Zeitschrift LAPPEN erscheint, glaubt, daß, um Schreiben zu motivieren
es lassen werden fließen und nicht geordnet werden sollte. Er 
regt Schreiben Anweisungen zu den blogs, zu den Foren und vielleicht 
zu Wikis an.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'auteur de cet article qui paraît dans le 
CHIFFON de magazine d'ETNI, estime qu'afin de motiver l'écriture elle
devrait être permise de couler et ne pas être évaluée. Il 
encourage des affectations d'écriture aux blogs, aux forum et 
probablement au Wikis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O escritor deste artigo que se publica no PANO do 
compartimento de ETNI, sente que a fim motivate a escrita deve ser 
permitida fluir e não ser classificada. Incentiva atribuições
da escrita aos blogs, aos forums e possivelmente ao Wikis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il produttore di questo articolo che è publicato 
nel PANNO dello scomparto di ETNI, ritiene che per motivare la 
scrittura dovrebbe essere permessa fluire e non classificarsi. 
Consiglia alle assegnazioni di scrittura ai blogs, alle tribune 
e possibilmente a Wikis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο συγγραφέας αυτού του άρθρου που εμφανίζεται στο 
ΚΟΥΡΈΛΙ περιοδικών ETNI, θεωρεί ότι προκειμένου να 
παρακινηθεί το γράψιμο πρέπει να επιτραπεί για να ρεύσει και να 
μην βαθμολογηθεί. Ενθαρρύνει τις αναθέσεις γραψίματος στα 
blogs, τα φόρουμ και ενδεχομένως Wikis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El programa de escritura de este artículo que 
aparezca en el TRAPO del compartimiento de ETNI, se siente que para 
motivar la escritura debe ser permitida fluir y no ser calificada. 
Él anima asignaciones de la escritura a los blogs, a los foros 
y posiblemente a Wikis.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schreiben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">blogs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wikis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écriture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">blogs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Wikis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">langue étrangère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">blogs</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
